articles.title: David Warner, Australia's 'impact man', makes an early mark on farewell tour | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: On a not-so straightforward first-day Perth pitch, the talismanic opener smashed 164 to pave the path for the hosts to call the shots
articles.content:
Warner making an early statement against the premier fast bowler in the Pakistan camp ©Getty
